title: The Claiming of Angelica, the Supernatural Sleuth: Her Erotic Adventures in the Haunted House on the Hill
description: This is a very erotic story of the Claiming of Angelica, a supernatural sleuth who investigates dangerous paranormal events. She enters into a haunted house on Infernal Hill and encounters two very masterful and horny creatures who take control of her unwilling body and force her to submit to waves of sexual pleasure intertwined with pain. Warning: This is a work of fiction and contains material meant for those over the age of 18, including explicit sex, sleep sex, supernatural sex, BDSM, and dubious consent.
author: Bella Swann
